markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Navigator](/NPCs.aspx?ID=951)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A navigator uses celestial bodies and shipping lanes to determine routes. For noncombat tasks involving navigation or sailing, the navigator is a 4th-level challenge.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Seafarer_Navigator.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Navigator](/NPCs.aspx?ID=951)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 242</row>

**Perception** +9

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +11, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Chart a Course** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) By spending 10 minutes of work and succeeding at a DC 22 [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) check, the navigator plots an optimal course. The severity of [environmental conditions](/Rules.aspx?ID=590) other than temperature are reduced by one step for 24 hours (two steps on a critical success). This changes moderate damage to minor damage, winds that create greater difficult terrain cause only difficult terrain, and so on.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), scroll case with ship's charts, [Writing Set](/Equipment.aspx?ID=63)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 28

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus navigator's edge

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus navigator's edgee

**Navigator's Edge**   The navigator deals an additional 1d6 weapon damage when on a ship.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-196" />
name: Navigator
